metadata.title: CVE-2015-8557 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The FontManager._get_nix_font_path function in formatters/img.py inPygments 1.2.2 through 2.0.2 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrarycommands via shell metacharacters in a font name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8557` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-pygments - 1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu1.1
python3-pygments - 1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pygments package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu1.1').
